by trishtrashpolka 05 Jul, 2017

Exactly what I wanted

It would have taken me ages to find these to match my set, it took 4 mins on eBay. They were delivered within 4 days. Cheaper than the shops too. Brilliant.

Verified purchase: Yes | Condition: new | Sold by: purely_kitchenware

(0)
(0)
by lihun55 16 Jun, 2016

looks same doesnt feel the same

the product is identical to look at but as soon as you hold it it feels lighter. does it match yes but if you want the real mccoy this is not it. will they last i dont know but the supplier was fast with delivery so cant fault that. would just like to have been told it was a knock off of the real thing.
